description.english: Start a new game.
description.schinese: 新开游戏
description.tchinese: 新開遊戲
description.japanese: 新しいゲーム
description.spanish: Comienza una partida nueva.
description.french: Commencez une nouvelle partie.
description.german: Ein neues Spiel starten.
description.portuguese: Comece um novo jogo.
description.russian: Начать новую игру.

description.english: Meet with the mysterious girl in the master bedroom.
description.schinese: 与二楼主卧里的神秘少女见面
description.tchinese: 與二樓主卧裡的神祕少女見面
description.japanese: 2階の主寝室にいる謎の少女と出会う
description.spanish: Reúnete con la muchacha misteriosa en la habitación principal.
description.french: Rencontrez la mystérieuse fille dans la chambre principale.
description.german: Triff das mysteriöse Mädchen im Hauptschlafzimmer.
description.portuguese: Encontre-se com a garota misteriosa no quarto principal.
description.russian: Встретьтесь с таинственной девушкой в главной спальне.

description.english: With Tomie, find Rin acting suspiciously in the garden.
description.koreana: 정원에서 수상하게 행동하는 린을 토미에와 함께 발견
description.schinese: 与富江发现在花园里行迹鬼祟的凛
description.tchinese: 與富江發現在花園裡行跡鬼祟的凜
description.japanese: 富江と一緒に庭で怪しい動きをする凜を見つける
description.spanish: Con Tomie, observa a Rin actuando de modo sospechoso en el jardín.
description.french: Avec Tomie, trouvez Rin qui agit de façon suspecte dans le jardin.
description.german: Suche Rin, die sich im Garden verdächtig verhält, zusammen mit Tomie.
description.portuguese: Com Tomie, encontre Rin agindo de forma suspeita no jardim.
description.russian: Вместе с Tomie найдите Rin, ведущую себя подозрительно в саду.

description.english: Enter the final room.
description.schinese: 进入最后的房间
description.tchinese: 進入最後的房間
description.japanese: 最後の部屋に入る
description.spanish: Entra en la última habitación.
description.french: Entrez dans la dernière pièce.
description.german: Betritt den letzten Raum.
description.portuguese: Entre na sala final.
description.russian: Войдите в последнюю комнату.

description.english: Successfully escape from the balloon head and get back in the mansion.
description.koreana: 사람 머리 풍선의 위협에서 벗어나 양옥으로 귀환
description.schinese: 成功逃离人头气球的威胁回到洋馆
description.tchinese: 成功逃離人頭氣球的威脅回到洋館
description.japanese: 首吊り気球の脅威から逃れ、洋館に戻る
description.spanish: Escapa de la cabeza de globo y regresa a la mansión.
description.french: Réussissez à fuir le ballon à tête et à retourner dans le manoir.
description.german: Entkomme dem Ballonkopf erfolgreich und begib dich wieder in die Villa.
description.portuguese: Escape da cabeça de balão e volte para a mansão.
description.russian: Успешно спаситесь от головы-шара и вернитесь в особняк.

description.english: In the darkroom, prepare the holy water used to destroy the black magic.
description.koreana: 암실에서 흑마법을 파괴하는 성수를 조합 성공
description.schinese: 在暗房内成功调制出破坏黑魔法的圣水
description.tchinese: 在暗房內成功調製出破壞黑魔法的聖水
description.japanese: 暗室で黒魔術を壊す聖水の調合に成功
description.spanish: En el cuarto oscuro, prepara el agua bendita para destruir la magia negra.
description.french: Dans la chambre noire, préparez l'eau bénite utilisée pour détruire la magie noire.
description.german: Bereite in der Dunkelkammer das Weihwasser vor, um die schwarze Magie zu zerstören.
description.portuguese: Na sala escura, prepare a água sagrada usada para destruir a magia negra.
description.russian: В темной комнате приготовьте святую воду, чтобы уничтожить черную магию.

description.english: Leave the mansion from the main door in the foyer.
description.schinese: 完成从玄关大门离开洋楼
description.tchinese: 完成從玄關大門離開洋樓
description.japanese: 玄関の正門から洋館を脱出
description.spanish: Sal de la mansión por la puerta principal del vestíbulo.
description.french: Quittez le manoir par la porte principale du foyer.
description.german: Verlasse die Villa über die Haupttür im Foyer.
description.portuguese: Saia da mansão pela porta principal no saguão.
description.russian: Покиньте особняк через главную дверь в фойе.

description.english: Enter the basement from the gold doors and uncover the truth.
description.koreana: 황금문을 통해 지하실로 들어가 마지막 진실을 밝히다
description.schinese: 从金色大门进入地下室，揭开最后的真相
description.tchinese: 從金色大門進入地下室，揭開最後的真相
description.japanese: 金色の扉から地下室に入り、最後の真実を暴く
description.spanish: Entra en el sótano por las puertas doradas para descubrir la verdad.
description.french: Entrez dans la cave par les portes dorées et découvrez la vérité.
description.german: Betritt den Keller durch die goldenen Türen und entdecke die Wahrheit.
description.portuguese: Entre no porão pelas portas douradas e descubra a verdade.
description.russian: Войдите в подвал через золотые двери и раскройте правду.

description.english: Enter the secret room from the silver doors and uncover the truth.
description.koreana: 은색 문을 통해 밀실로 들어가 마지막 진실을 밝히다
description.schinese: 从银色大门进入密室，揭开最后的真相
description.tchinese: 從銀色大門進入密室，揭開最後的真相
description.japanese: 銀色の扉から密室に入り、最後の真実を暴く
description.spanish: Entra en la sala secreta por las puertas plateadas para descubrir la verdad.
description.french: Entrez dans la salle secrète par les portes d'argent et découvrez la vérité.
description.german: Betritt den Geheimraum durch die silbernen Türen und entdecke die Wahrheit.
description.portuguese: Entre na sala secreta pelas portas prateadas e descubra a verdade.
description.russian: Войдите в тайную комнату через серебряные двери и раскройте правду.

description.english: Don't miss a single chance to feed the cat. Meow.
description.koreana: 고양이에게 먹이를 주는 기회를 한 번도 놓치지 않는다
description.schinese: 没错过任何一次喂食猫咪的机会
description.tchinese: 沒錯過任何一次餵食貓咪的機會
description.japanese: 猫の餌やりを一度もかかさなかった
description.spanish: No pierdas ninguna oportunidad de alimentar al gato. Miau.
description.french: Ne manquez aucune occasion de nourrir le chat. Miaou.
description.german: Verpasse niemals die Gelegenheit, die Katze zu füttern. Miau.
description.portuguese: Não perca nenhuma chance de alimentar o gato. Miau.
description.russian: Не пропустите ни одной возможности накормить кота. Мяу.

description.english: Complete the Collection.
description.schinese: 收藏品全部收集
description.tchinese: 收藏品全部收集
description.japanese: すべてのコレクションを集める
description.spanish: Completa la colección.
description.french: Rassemblez toute la collection.
description.german: Vervollständige die Kollektion.
description.portuguese: Complete a Coleção.
description.russian: Завершите коллекцию.

description.english: Set a bear trap.
description.schinese: 第一次设置捕兽夹
description.tchinese: 第一次設置捕獸夾
description.japanese: 初めて獣捕獲用の罠を設置
description.spanish: Coloca una trampa para osos.
description.french: Placez un piège à ours.
description.german: Stelle eine Bärenfalle.
description.portuguese: Arme uma armadilha de urso.
description.russian: Установите капкан.

description.english: Use an environment trap.
description.schinese: 第一次使用环境陷阱
description.tchinese: 第一次使用環境陷阱
description.japanese: 初めて環境アイテムを使用
description.spanish: Usa una trampa del entorno.
description.french: Utilisez un piège d'environnement.
description.german: Verwende eine Umgebungsfalle.
description.portuguese: Use uma armadilha ambiental.
description.russian: Используйте ловушку окружения.

description.english: Use a bear trap to destroy a statue.
description.schinese: 第一次使用捕兽夹破坏掉雕刻
description.tchinese: 第一次使用捕獸夾破壞掉雕刻
description.japanese: 初めて獣捕獲用の罠で彫刻を壊した
description.spanish: Coloca una trampa para osos para destruir una estatua.
description.french: Utilisez un piège à ours pour détruire une statue.
description.german: Verwende eine Bärenfalle, um eine Statue zu zerstören.
description.portuguese: Use uma armadilha de urso para destruir uma estátua.
description.russian: Используйте капкан, чтобы уничтожить статую.

description.english: Use an environment trap to destroy a statue.
description.schinese: 第一次使用环境陷阱破坏掉雕刻
description.tchinese: 第一次使用環境陷阱破壞掉雕刻
description.japanese: 初めて獣捕獲用の罠で彫刻を壊した
description.spanish: Usa una trampa del entorno para destruir una estatua.
description.french: Utilisez un piège environnemental pour détruire une statue.
description.german: Verwende eine Umgebungsfalle, um eine Statue zu zerstören.
description.portuguese: Use uma armadilha de ambiente para destruir uma estátua.
description.russian: Используйте ловушку окружения, чтобы уничтожить статую.

description.english: Set 30 bear traps.
description.schinese: 设置捕兽夹共30次
description.tchinese: 設置捕獸夾共30次
description.japanese: 獣捕獲用の罠を30回設置
description.spanish: Coloca 30 trampas para osos.
description.french: Posez 30 pièges à ours.
description.german: Stelle 30 Bärenfallen auf.
description.portuguese: Arme 30 armadilhas de urso.
description.russian: Установите 30 капканов.

description.english: Use 30 environment traps.
description.schinese: 使用环境陷阱共30次
description.tchinese: 使用環境陷阱共30次
description.japanese: 環境トラップを30回使用
description.spanish: Usa 30 trampas del entorno.
description.french: Utilisez 30 pièges environnementaux.
description.german: Verwende 30 Umgebungsfallen.
description.portuguese: Use 30 armadilhas de ambiente.
description.russian: Используйте 30 ловушек окружения.

description.english: Hide in a closet.
description.schinese: 第一次进入衣柜
description.tchinese: 第一次進入衣櫃
description.japanese: 初めてクローゼットに入る
description.spanish: Ocúltate en un armario.
description.french: Cachez-vous dans un placard.
description.german: Verstecke dich in einem Wandschrank.
description.portuguese: Esconda-se em um armário.
description.russian: Спрячьтесь в шкафу.

description.english: Destroy 20 statues.
description.schinese: 破坏掉20次雕刻
description.tchinese: 破壞掉20次雕刻
description.japanese: 彫刻を20回壊す
description.spanish: Destruye 20 estatuas.
description.french: Détruisez 20 statues.
description.german: Zerstöre 20 Statuen.
description.portuguese: Destrua 20 estátuas.
description.russian: Разрушьте 20 статуй.

description.english: Clear any rolling ball maze in 20 seconds or less.
description.schinese: 在20秒内通关任一滚球迷宫
description.tchinese: 在20秒內通關任一滾球迷宮
description.japanese: 20秒以内にいずれかの迷宮をクリア
description.spanish: Supera el laberinto de canicas en 20 segundos o menos.
description.french: Terminez n'importe quel labyrinthe de boules roulantes en 20 secondes ou moins.
description.german: Löse jedes Labyrinth-Brettspiel in 20 Sekunden oder weniger.
description.portuguese: Conclua qualquer labirinto de bola rolante em 20 segundos ou menos.
description.russian: Пройдите любой лабиринт с шаром за 20 секунд или меньше.

description.english: Catch the balloon head in a bear trap or have it get tangled in the trellis.
description.koreana: 사람 머리 풍선을 덫이나 화분대로 묶는다
description.schinese: 让人头气球被捕兽夹或花架缠住
description.tchinese: 讓人頭氣球被捕獸夾或花架纏住
description.japanese: 首吊り気球を獣捕獲用の罠または鉢植えで足止めする
description.spanish: Inmoviliza a la cabeza de globo en una trampa para osos o haz que se enrede en la celosía.
description.french: Attrapez le ballon à tête dans un piège à ours ou faites en sorte qu'il s'emmêle dans le treillis.
description.german: Fange den Ballonkopf in einer Bärenfalle oder lass ihn sich in einem Rankgerüst verfangen.
description.portuguese: Prenda a cabeça de balão em uma armadilha de urso ou faça-a enroscar no treliçado.
description.russian: Поймай голову-шар в капкан или заставь ее запутаться в решетке.

description.english: Leave the safe room.
description.schinese: 离开安全屋
description.tchinese: 離開安全屋
description.japanese: セーフハウスから出る
description.spanish: Sal del refugio.
description.french: Quittez la salle de sûreté.
description.german: Verlasse den Schutzraum.
description.portuguese: Saia da sala segura.
description.russian: Покиньте безопасную комнату.

description.english: Die and return to the safe room 10 times.
description.koreana: 사망 후 안전 구역으로 돌아온 횟수 총 10회
description.schinese: 死亡回到安全屋共计10次
description.tchinese: 死亡回到安全屋共計10次
description.japanese: 死亡して計10回セーフハウスに戻る
description.spanish: Muere y regresa al refugio 10 veces.
description.french: Mourez et retournez dans la salle de sûreté 10 fois.
description.german: Sterbe und kehre 10 Mal zum Schutzraum zurück.
description.portuguese: Morra e retorne à sala segura 10 vezes.
description.russian: Умрите и вернитесь в безопасную комнату 10 раз.

description.english: Stay in the safe room for a total of 20 minutes.
description.koreana: 안전 구역에 머문 시간 총 20분 달성
description.schinese: 待在安全屋共达到20分钟
description.tchinese: 待在安全屋共達到20分鐘
description.japanese: セーフハウスに計20分間滞在
description.spanish: Permanece en el refugio durante 20 minutos.
description.french: Restez dans la salle de sûreté pendant 20 minutes au total.
description.german: Bleib für insgesamt 20 Minuten im Schutzraum.
description.portuguese: Permaneça na sala segura por um total de 20 minutos.
description.russian: Пробудьте в безопасной комнате в общей сложности 20 минут.

displayName.french: Vous ne pouvez pas me voir

description.english: Stay in closets for a total of 10 minutes.
description.schinese: 待在衣柜内共达到10分钟
description.tchinese: 待在衣櫃內共達到10分鐘
description.japanese: クローゼット内に計10分間滞在
description.spanish: Permanece en armarios durante 10 minutos.
description.french: Restez dans des placards pendant 10 minutes au total.
description.german: Bleib für insgesamt 10 Minuten in Wandschränken.
description.portuguese: Fique em armários por um total de 10 minutos.
description.russian: Пробудьте в шкафах в общей сложности 10 минут.

description.english: Use less than 3 bear traps to kill enemies and reach any ending.
description.koreana: 덫 3개 미만으로 적을 처치하고 엔딩 도달
description.schinese: 使用少于3个捕兽夹击杀敌人，并进入任一结局
description.tchinese: 使用少於3個捕獸夾擊殺敵人，並進入任一結局
description.japanese: 敵を倒すのに使った獣捕獲用の罠が3個以下で、いずれかのエンディングに到達
description.spanish: Usa menos de 3 trampas para osos para eliminar enemigos y desbloquea cualquier final.
description.french: Utilisez moins de 3 pièges à ours pour tuer les ennemis et atteignez n'importe quelle fin.
description.german: Verwende weniger als 3 Bärenfallen, um Feinde zu töten und irgendein Ende zu erreichen.
description.portuguese: Use menos de 3 armadilhas de urso para matar inimigos e alcançar qualquer final.
description.russian: Используйте меньше трех капканов, чтобы убить врагов и достичь любого конца.

description.english: Use less than 3 environment traps to kill enemies and reach any ending.
description.koreana: 환경 함정 3개 미만으로 적을 처치하고 엔딩 도달
description.schinese: 使用少于3个环境陷阱击杀敌人，并进入任一结局
description.tchinese: 使用少於3個環境陷阱擊殺敵人，並進入任一結局
description.japanese: 敵を倒すのに使った環境アイテムが3個以下で、いずれかのエンディングに到達
description.spanish: Usa menos de 3 trampas de entorno para eliminar enemigos y desbloquea cualquier final.
description.french: Utilisez moins de 3 pièges environnementaux pour tuer les ennemis et atteignez n'importe quelle fin.
description.german: Verwende weniger als 3 Umgebungsfallen, um Feinde zu töten und irgendein Ende zu erreichen.
description.portuguese: Use menos de 3 armadilhas ambientais para matar inimigos e alcançar qualquer final.
description.russian: Используйте меньше трех ловушек окружения, чтобы убить врагов и достичь любого конца.

displayName.japanese: マニアックの忠実なファン

description.english: Complete all achievements.
description.schinese: 全成就取得
description.tchinese: 全成就取得
description.japanese: すべての実績を達成
description.spanish: Completa todos los logros.
description.french: Débloquez tous les succès.
description.german: Schließe alle Errungenschaften ab.
description.portuguese: Complete todas as conquistas.
description.russian: Завершите все достижения.
